summary: Premium modern business website for EVRON India Private Limited (GST registered energy company). Features: Hero section with tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green', headline 'EVRON – Powering the Future of Energy', contact number +91 9296174465; Company info (EVRON India Private Limited, GSTIN: 20AAJCE1166D1Z8, Registered Office: P-22, City Center, Sector-4, Near Circus Maidan, Bokaro Steel City – 827004, Branch Office: Plot No-673, Ranchi Road, Redma Women's ITI, South Daltonganj, Palamu, Jharkhand – 822102); Products section displayed BEFORE About section with 5 premium product cards with detailed specs: EV Lithium Battery (LiFePO4, 3000-5000 cycles, 5Y Full+3Y Pro-rata=8Y Total Warranty), Solar Storage Battery, Telecom Battery, Lithium Inverter 2KW (2000W, 8Y Battery+2Y Inverter Warranty), Lithium Inverter 3KW (3000W, 8Y Battery+2Y Inverter Warranty) with EVRON branding; About section (EVRON India Private Limited description, company details, GSTIN); Why Choose EVRON (7 benefits: Long Life Lithium Technology, 3000-5000 Deep Cycles, Smart Advanced BMS, 8 Years Warranty, High Safety Standards, Energy Efficient Systems, Reliable After-Sales Support); Contact form with Name/Phone/Email/Message fields; Footer with links (About EVRON, Products, Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy, Contact), tagline, GST registered statement. Design: black, green (#2ecc71), white color scheme. Brand identity: EVRON logo with two symmetrical green leaves forming subtle V shape, bold modern sans-serif. Product branding: matte black/white body, EVRON in bright green, two-leaf logo, tagline on products. Terms & Conditions page with warranty policy. Hero section CTA buttons: 'Explore Products' and 'Contact Now'. Industrial Battery removed.
architectural_notes: Responsive design for mobile and desktop viewports
Address section displays two locations: Head Office in Bokaro Steel City and Branch Office in Palamu, Jharkhand
Contact information: Phone +91 9296174465, Email infoevronindia@gmail.com displayed in Contact section and Footer
Tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' appears below logo in Hero and in Footer
Logo design: Two symmetrical green leaves forming subtle V shape representing growth and energy, with bold modern sans-serif font
Product branding allows matte black OR white product body with green branding accents
Contact form with Name, Phone, Email, Message fields
Products section displayed BEFORE About section
Product cards display detailed specifications and warranty information
EV Lithium Battery: LiFePO4 technology, 3000-5000 cycles, 8 Years Total Warranty (5Y Full+3Y Pro-rata)
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- EVRON corporate logo with two symmetrical green leaves forming subtle V-shape above bold EVRON text in modern sans-serif, using green #2ecc71 and black colors, minimal clean scalable professional design (evron-logo.dim_400x400.png)
- EV Lithium Battery product with matte black or white body, EVRON logo with two-leaf green symbol printed above EVRON text, tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' printed below, green accent lines, realistic commercial product photography style, LiFePO4 battery appearance (ev-battery-product.dim_800x800.png)
- Solar Storage Battery product with matte black or white body, EVRON logo with two-leaf green symbol printed above EVRON text, tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' printed below, green accent lines, realistic commercial product photography style (solar-battery-product.dim_800x800.png)
- Telecom Battery product with matte black or white body, EVRON logo with two-leaf green symbol printed above EVRON text, tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' printed below, green accent lines, realistic commercial product photography style, tower backup battery appearance (telecom-battery-product.dim_800x800.png)
- Lithium Inverter 2KW product with matte black or white body, EVRON logo with two-leaf green symbol printed above EVRON text, tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' printed below, green accent lines, realistic commercial product photography style, 2000W inverter appearance (inverter-2kw-product.dim_800x800.png)
- Lithium Inverter 3KW product with matte black or white body, EVRON logo with two-leaf green symbol printed above EVRON text, tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' printed below, green accent lines, realistic commercial product photography style, 3000W inverter appearance (inverter-3kw-product.dim_800x800.png)
- Hero section background with energetic powerful subtle energy pattern or gradient in black and green theme (hero-energy-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- GST Registered badge style element with professional corporate design in green and black colors (gst-badge.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a hero section with headline 'Powering the Future of Energy', subheading 'Advanced Lithium & EV Battery Solutions', and a 'Contact Us' call-to-action button that scrolls to the contact form
Create an About section with a brief description explaining that EVARON provides high-performance, durable and safe battery solutions for EVs and solar systems
Create a Products section displaying three product cards: 'EV Lithium Battery', 'Solar Storage Battery', and 'Industrial Battery Pack', each with appropriate visual presentation
Create a 'Why Choose Us' section highlighting four key benefits: 'Long Life Cycle', 'Fast Charging', 'High Safety Standards', and 'Energy Efficient'
Create a Contact section with a form containing Name, Email, and Message fields, and implement form submission handling in the backend to store contact inquiries
Create a professional footer displaying the company name 'EVARON'
Apply a modern, clean corporate design with a black, orange, and white color scheme throughout the website, using bold headings and professional layout
Ensure the entire website is fully responsive and displays correctly on both mobile and desktop devices

Update hero section headline to 'EVRON – Powering the Future of Energy', subheading to 'Advanced Lithium Batteries & Inverter Solutions', and change call-to-action button text from 'Contact Us' to 'Contact Now'
Display contact phone number '9296174465' prominently in the hero section

Update About section content to describe EVRON as an innovative energy company providing high-performance, durable and safe lithium battery and inverter solutions for homes, electric vehicles, solar systems and industrial use
Add 'Lithium Inverter' as a fourth product card in the Products section alongside EV Lithium Battery, Solar Storage Battery, and Industrial Battery Pack
Update Why Choose Us section to display five benefits: 'Long Life Cycle', 'Fast Charging Technology', 'High Safety Standards', 'Energy Efficient Systems', and 'Reliable Power Backup'
Display phone number '9296174465' prominently in the Contact section alongside the contact form
Update footer to display company name 'EVRON', tagline 'Empowering Sustainable Energy', and phone number '9296174465'
Replace all instances of 'EVARON' brand name with 'EVRON' throughout the entire website including all sections, text content, and metadata
Update color scheme from black/orange/white to black/green (#2ecc71)/white throughout the entire website including all sections, buttons, accents, and hover states
Render all generated product images and brand assets as static files in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Update the tagline throughout the website from 'Empowering Sustainable Energy' to 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' in the hero section (below logo) and footer
Update phone number format from '9296174465' to '+91 9296174465' in the hero section, contact section, and footer
Add email address 'infoevronindia@gmail.com' to the Contact section and Footer

Create a new Address section displaying Head Office at 'P-22, City Center, Sector-4, Near Circus Maidan, Bokaro Steel City – 827004' and Branch Office at 'Plot No-673, Ranchi Road, Redma Women's ITI, South Daltonganj, Palamu, Jharkhand – 822102' in professional format
Regenerate all battery and inverter product images with updated tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' printed on the product body, replacing the old 'Powering Sustainable Energy' tagline
Render all regenerated product images as static files in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory

Update About section content to describe EVRON as an innovative energy company delivering reliable lithium battery and inverter solutions for homes, telecom infrastructure, EVs and solar systems with strong professional tone
Remove Industrial Battery Pack product card completely from the Products section
Add Telecom Battery product card to the Products section with professional description and premium styling
Split the existing Lithium Inverter product into two separate product cards: 'Lithium Inverter 2KW (2000W)' and 'Lithium Inverter 3KW (3000W)'

Update Why Choose EVRON section to display six benefits: 'Long Life Cycle', 'Fast Charging Technology', 'High Safety Standards', 'Energy Efficient Systems', 'Reliable Power Backup', and 'Advanced BMS Technology'

Render all generated product images and brand assets (logo, product images for EV Battery, Solar Battery, Telecom Battery, Inverter 2KW, Inverter 3KW) as static files in frontend/public/assets/generated directory

Redesign the EVRON logo as a powerful corporate brand identity: two symmetrical green leaves forming a subtle 'V' shape representing sustainability, growth and clean energy, with 'EVRON' text in bold modern sans-serif font below, using green (#2ecc71) and black for contrast, in a minimal, clean, scalable design that looks realistic and professional, not cartoonish

Update hero section headline to 'EVRON – Powering the Future of Energy', display tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' below logo, update subheading to 'Advanced Lithium Batteries & Inverter Solutions for Homes, Telecom & EV Applications', update CTA buttons to 'Explore Products' and 'Contact Now', and ensure phone number '+91 9296174465' is prominently displayed
Create an energetic and powerful hero section background with a subtle energy pattern or gradient that feels dynamic and impactful

Regenerate all product images (EV Battery, Solar Battery, Telecom Battery, Inverter 2KW, Inverter 3KW) with realistic commercial product photography style featuring matte black or white body, EVRON logo clearly printed (two-leaf green logo above EVRON text), tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' printed below brand name, green accent lines for premium look, with branding appearing printed on battery casing (not floating text)
Reorder page sections so Products section displays BEFORE About section in the main App component

Update EV Lithium Battery product card to display Technology: Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4), Features: 3000–5000 deep discharge cycles, high energy density, lightweight design, smart inbuilt BMS, overcharge & over-discharge protection, short circuit protection, long operational life, and Warranty: 5 Years Full Replacement + 3 Years Pro-rata (Total 8 Years Warranty)

Update Solar Storage Battery product card to display Features: Deep discharge support, fast charging capability, eco-friendly lithium technology, long cycle performance, stable voltage output, with description noting it's designed for solar energy systems

Update Telecom Battery product card to display description 'High reliability lithium battery for telecom infrastructure and tower backup systems' with Features: Continuous power stability, Smart BMS monitoring, temperature protection, heavy duty performance, long lifecycle durability

Update Lithium Inverter 2KW product card to display specifications: Pure Sine Wave Output, 2000W capacity, smart charging system, heavy load support, advanced safety protection, and Warranty: 8 Years Battery + 2 Years Inverter

Update Lithium Inverter 3KW product card to display specifications: 3000W high power output, Smart BMS integration, high efficiency performance, overload & short circuit protection, reliable backup solution, and Warranty: 8 Years Battery + 2 Years Inverter

Update About section title to 'About EVRON India Private Limited' and replace content with: 'EVRON India Private Limited is a GST registered energy solutions company based in Jharkhand, India. We specialize in advanced Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) batteries, Telecom Batteries, Solar Storage Solutions and Lithium Inverter Systems designed to deliver long-lasting, energy-efficient and sustainable power solutions. Our products are engineered with advanced BMS protection, 3000–5000 cycle performance and high safety standards to ensure reliable power backup for homes, telecom networks and electric mobility solutions.'

Update Contact form to include Name, Phone, Email, and Message fields (add Phone field if not present) and ensure phone number '+91 9296174465' and email 'infoevronindia@gmail.com' are clearly displayed

Create a new Terms & Conditions page accessible from footer navigation with content including: product specifications subject to change disclaimer, warranty validity requiring original invoice, installation guidelines requirement, company's right to inspect products before warranty approval, warranty policy details (Lithium Battery: 5 Years Full Replacement + 3 Years Pro-rata = Total 8 Years Warranty, Inverter: 2 Years against manufacturing defects), and warranty exclusions (physical damage, water damage, improper installation, unauthorized modifications, external wiring faults)
Create a Privacy Policy page accessible from footer navigation with standard privacy policy content appropriate for an energy company website

Update footer to include navigation links (About EVRON, Products, Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy, Contact), display tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green', show phone '+91 9296174465' and email 'infoevronindia@gmail.com', and add statement 'EVRON India Private Limited is a GST registered company operating under Indian corporate regulations'

Apply premium modern corporate design throughout the website with clean corporate layout, premium spacing, green (#2ecc71) highlight accents, GST Registered badge style element, warranty highlighted visually on product cards, professional product grid, energy-themed subtle background, and ensure full mobile responsiveness
Ensure bold modern sans-serif typography is applied consistently throughout the website as per the design requirements
